extendedInfo.description: Find Postboxes helps you locate nearby post boxes and post offices wherever you are in the world. It can also tell you the last collection times at many of these to help you catch the last post!Search for postboxes and post offices around your current location, or look for a mailbox in another area via a simple place name or postcode / zipcode search. Pick the box you want and call up a route map directly to it from your current location. Distances can be displayed in metric or imperial units.Not all areas feature complete coverage yet although most major (and many not so big) metropolitan areas have excellent coverage. We're adding more postbox locations to the database daily so the data will only ever improve, and even if we don't know about your absolute closest mailbox we'll normally have one nearby which might be good enough in many situations.Are we missing boxes in your area? Add them straight from the app... Simply stand next to the postbox with your phone and press âupdateâ to give us the coordinates, then âaddâ and youâre done! If you want, you can enter the postal operator and the last collection times (as written on the front of the post box), but those are not required for a basic submission. Weâll figure out the name of the street youâre on and e-mail you to confirm your data. We'll then feed your update back into our database and add the postbox to OpenStreetMap so that the data is made openly available.Find Postboxes uses the built in GPS to get your current location. If your location cannot be determined automatically then you can always enter your post code to get started. Please note that an internet connection is required to get location and map data. New postbox entries are submitted to OpenStreetMap and all edits are submitted back to this project too.Our current approximate coverage is:UK ****Luxembourg ****Germany ****Austria ***Switzerland ***Finland ***Denmark ***The Netherlands ***Ireland ***Australia **New Zealand **Belgium **Sweden **France **Czech Republic **Norway **Estonia **USA **Canada **

reviews.title: Needs to differentiate between mailboxes
reviews.comment: In canada, we have community mailboxes which can only accept small items such as letters and regular ones. It would be good if a feature could be added to tell you what type of mailbox it is and if it\'s near a post office
reviews.author: Muchen Zhou

reviews.title: Maybe outside the US
reviews.comment: Just plain worse than google.
reviews.author: Jacob Faturechi

reviews.title: Easy to use. Great app for RV travelers.
reviews.comment: I am always somewhere new and like an easy way to locate a mail box or post office.
reviews.author: Jim Guld

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I travel a lot by narrow boat and sell on E.bay so it is invaluable. A great App.
reviews.author: Lesley Sargood

reviews.title: Holo theme?
reviews.comment: Awesome little app, needs holo themed though.
reviews.author: Christopher Williamson

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: A fine little app that does what it should. The support staff are exceptionally responsive and take a lot of trouble to improve the postbox data.
reviews.author: Rob Watt

reviews.title: Well handy
reviews.comment: Only does one thing but does it quickly and well. I wish more apps were like this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well, but database sparse
reviews.comment: Works well, but database sparse.  Many post boxes are missing - and needs the community spirit to update this with any that are missing.
reviews.author: Sean P

reviews.title: Badly needs updating
reviews.comment: The UI is poor and needs work. Also why do I have to scroll through every postal service in the world to get to the one I want to add? Please make the list of postal services configurable to ease the process of us updating your dataset for you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does the job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Does exactly what you need it for. Very easy to use  and reliable, also easy to update when you update a new box you find.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very accurate
reviews.comment: Good idea,  but not very accurate.  Could be a lot more accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent application!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pop it in the Box
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very handy..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well thought out app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One post office listed for my town of 70,000. No mailboxes. Useless, uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best so far
reviews.comment: Tried a couple of others and they didn\'t show the two closest to me, this one does! It\'s always handy to know where they are if you\'re out and about and have a letter to post! Will be updating boxes as I find them whilst out walking with the dog lol.
reviews.author: A Google User
